CONTACT.TITLE: Get in Touch
CONTACT.SUBTITLE: Have questions? We'd love to hear from you.
CONTACT.INFO_DESC: Reach out to us through any of the following channels
CONTACT.NAME: Your Name
CONTACT.SUBJECT: Subject
CONTACT.FAQ1_A: We offer a wide range of technology courses including web development, mobile development, data science, cloud computing, and more.
CONTACT.FAQ2_Q: How do I enroll in a course?
CONTACT.FAQ2_A: Simply browse our courses, select the one you're interested in, and click the Enroll button. You can pay via WhatsApp or other methods.
CONTACT.FAQ3_A: Yes! Upon successful completion of any course, you'll receive a verified certificate that you can share on LinkedIn.
CONTACT.FAQ4_A: We offer a 7-day money-back guarantee for all paid courses. Contact our support team if you're not satisfied.

ABOUT.TITLE: About TechMaster
ABOUT.SUBTITLE: Empowering the next generation of tech professionals
ABOUT.MISSION_DESC: To provide high-quality tech education accessible to everyone.
ABOUT.VISION_DESC: To become the leading platform for technology education.
ABOUT.VALUE1_DESC: We strive for excellence in everything we do, from course content to student support.
ABOUT.VALUE2_DESC: We embrace new technologies and teaching methods to provide cutting-edge education.
ABOUT.VALUE3_DESC: We believe quality education should be accessible to everyone, everywhere.
ABOUT.STORY_P1: TechMaster was founded with a simple mission: to make quality tech education accessible to everyone in the Arab world.
ABOUT.STORY_P2: Since our founding, we've helped thousands of students launch their tech careers through comprehensive courses and hands-on projects.
ABOUT.STORY_P3: Today, we continue to grow and evolve, always keeping our students' success at the heart of everything we do.
ABOUT.TEAM_DESC: Meet the passionate people behind TechMaster
ABOUT.BIO_CEO: Passionate about education and technology, Ahmed founded TechMaster to bridge the tech skills gap.
ABOUT.BIO_CTO: With 15+ years in software engineering, Fatima leads our technical infrastructure and innovation.
ABOUT.BIO_LEAD: Mohamed brings real-world experience to our courses with his background in enterprise software.
ABOUT.BIO_CONTENT: Sara ensures our content is engaging, accurate, and always up-to-date with industry standards.
ABOUT.FEATURE1_DESC: Learn from industry professionals with years of real-world experience.
ABOUT.FEATURE2_DESC: Join thousands of learners from around the world.
ABOUT.FEATURE3_DESC: Learn on the go with our mobile-friendly platform.
ABOUT.FEATURE4_DESC: Earn recognized certificates to showcase your skills.
ABOUT.FEATURE5_DESC: Get help whenever you need it from our support team.
ABOUT.FEATURE6_DESC: Your data is protected with enterprise-grade security.
ABOUT.CTA_DESC: Join thousands of students who have transformed their careers with TechMaster.
